channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Exploring the new AI chat template
item.description: In this post I explore the new .NET AI Chat Web App template (currently in preview) and take a brief look at the implementation it provides Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/exploring-the-new-ai-chat-template/

item.title: Creating a 'pooled' dependency injection lifetime
item.description: In this post I investigate how to create a 'pooled' dependency injection scope that automatically pools services between multiple requests Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-a-pooled-dependency-injection-lifetime/
